hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) slaughtered a cow on behalf of all his wives who had performed ‘Umrah, during the Farewell Pilgrimage.”

chapter.ara-name: باب عَنْ كَمْ، تُجْزِئُ الْبَدَنَةُ وَالْبَقَرَةُ
chapter.eng-name: Number of persons for whom a camel and a cow is sufficient
